description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2.1 Statistics(based on Spring Boot2 Statistic by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod="$pod", service="$service", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod="$pod", service="$service", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[1m])

title: Spring Boot Statistics
